title: keep disconnecting during client during game, then happens again after reconnecting
body: i get into a game just fine and internet is normal, then suddenly it comes up with soemthing saying that the client isnt working and im always able to rejoin perfectly fine but it just happens again a minute later, everything was working normal until last night, it randomly happened in a game and now ive got a 20min ban from it

replies.body: It seems like your network is failing to maintain a connection to our servers, which will end up kicking you off or not establishing a connection at all.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network.  This should get you squared away, but let me know if you have any questions!
